replies.body:
{tag=456c20d626d5470980b540bf9307bf4c}
As a Moderator and mentor you're a decent one. As a player, well, I rarely verse you ;P It's nice to talk to you and help you out whenever I can.

So far so good, looking forward to what the semis and finals have to offer. So far, imo, It's probably the best one hosted yet.

Cennet or Allah will take it out. Apollo will come 3rd and Sag 4th.

{tag=a9f11454beac4cc3a1381780802c8794}
You were a great moderator and so far you're a decent senior ;) I enjoy working with you on the Social Media team and can see it's an area you have a passion for. I'm very happy you decided to come back to the staff team.

{tag=9116d3fa14004adaaecd2eae1d73e383}
As a builder and map maker you know your stuff well. As a player your above average to be honest. As a friend, well we haven't talked too much recently and we use to talk quite a bit back in the day, which I kind of miss, but overall your still got your sense of humor and silliness that puts a smile on my face.

{tag=3cce00809faa48f982cf64410305822a}
As a Moderator I didn't know you that well, I just assumed that you were just the average guy in Apollo but I was wrong. replies.body:
{tag=ElementalAssasin}
 Youre a good person at heart but I find that you lack in certain areas as a player,Im being honest and I dont mean to offend you. One thing you do well though is your communication, you have a solid mic and you call out (which not too many others do :/).

I dont love anyone!


 {tag=20017ca515fe4708893563db33af58ef}   
 Our relationship has been up and down majority of the time weve known each other. However both of us agree on a lot of things regarding issues, back in our mod days when you were senior and I was mod we agreed on a lot of stuff. Good rant times. As a player youre a good rusher and good at pvp. Youre one of the seniors I looked up to when I was a moderator. 



 {tag=f4eae547b4d8434898447e444e31b389}   
Hasnt changed too much. As a player youre a good defender, and for some strange reason, I find that a lot of people underestimate you as a player. I sometimes find you to be a bit immature at times, mostly in staff slack sometimes, but when you were Staff something would just click and you were a very good staff member. You have my respect!


{tag=7dcb1605a6414f6f99efea04278b6f7c}   
Cant say I know you that well. What I do know is that you are good at pvp and you like to joke around quite a bit. As for team allah, imo, there a decent team mostly filled with guys you know from OCN. Half of them want to win whilst the other half couldnt care less.
